meanings.definition: A person who studies the structure of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The anatomists carefully examined the frog's internal organs.
meanings.sent2: The team of anatomists gathered to discuss the human skeletal system.
meanings.sent3: The anatomists were puzzled when they found a rubber duck inside the cadaver.
meanings.sent4: She had the precision of an anatomist when dissecting the fruit for her science project.
meanings.sent5: The anatomists used diagrams to help students understand the human body better.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the study of anatomy.
meanings.sent1: The hospital hired new anatomists to assist in the research lab.
meanings.sent2: The anatomists in the class were eager to learn about the muscular system.
meanings.sent3: The group of anatomists had a friendly competition to see who could identify the most bones.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the city streets like an anatomist mapping out the human body.
meanings.sent5: The anatomists used models to teach students about the different body systems.
